/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and cars, creating a vibrant tableau of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape.
